Class Display

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  Display
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class Display
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Display has a paintComponent and draws the plotting area and function in the center of the panel

See Also:
Serialized Form
